item.title: TODAY: Tis the Season: Card Making & Holiday Drive
item.description: Our FREE holiday event at Mineral Springs Park is today 1-4PM. Come join us at Mineral Springs Park, 1500 N 105th St, for a free holiday event including music, holiday card-making activities, festive games, hot beverages and snacks. Food and clothing items will be collected for Aurora Commons. All are …

item.title: Open Source Meetup Tonight 6PM
item.description:
Join us tonight at North Seattle College, for our first ever Open Source development meetup:

There will be free food and coffee (from Pilgrim Coffeehouse!).

Hope to see some of you there!

~Timothy

item.title: Leaves are Falling & Autumn is Here: November Community Events
item.description:
Correction (11/5/18): The ALUV meeting has been cancelled this month due to scheduling conflicts.

We hope everyone had fun at the Licton Springs Park Halloween Walk yesterday! There were over 300 trick-or-treaters and lots of great costumes!!

item.title: Outdoor Movie Night and Dog Pawty TONIGHT at 6PM
item.description:
The FREE Outdoor Movie Night and Dog Pawty is TONIGHT!

Rain or shine the show must go on! We will have tents up in case of rain and encourage attendees to bring a rain jacket and lawn chair and/or blanket.

item.title: Happening now: Licton Springs PPatch 5th Anniversary
item.description:
REMINDER: Licton Springs PPatch 5th anniversary is happening NOW until 3PM

Join neighbors at the P-Patch (92nd and Meridian - the south edge of North Seattle College campus):

For:

  • Demonstrations and Q&A
  • Bishop Blanchet Beekeepers
  • North Seattle College Botany Class Pollinator Garden
  • Kiss Activities
  • Potluck
  • Recipes From the Garden

item.title: Night Out Success!
item.description:
Thank you to everyone that came out across Licton Springs to meet with your neighbors and make 2018 another great success! Across the Licton Springs area, hundreds of neighbors got to know each other across over seven block parties.
